revised_title: Kelvin Ship-Wave Source: Near-Field Convergent Expansion of an Integral
tldr: The author presents a new method for evaluating the integral term in the Kelvin ship-wave source potential, which is essential in the mathematical theory of wave resistance of ships. The near-field convergent expansion of the integral is achieved by reducing it to loop integrals and using recurrence relations for the involved polynomials and functions. This method provides a more efficient way to compute Kelvin wave source potentials for numerical applications.
